title: AFFOGATO
description: Espresso poured on a vanilla ice cream. Served in a cappuccino cup.

title: AMERICANO (or ESPRESSO AMERICANO)
description: Espresso with added hot water served in a cappuccino cup)

title: CAFFÈ MOCHA
description: A caffè latte with chocolate and whipped cream, made by pouring in cup

title: ESPRESSO CON PANNA
description: A shot of espresso topped with whipped cream. Served in an espresso  of panna.

title: CAPPUCCINO
description: A coffee drink consisting of espresso and a milk foam mixture (drink size about 160). Served in a cappuccino cup.

title: LATTE MACCHIATO
description: Like a traditional caffè latte, but with a thicker layer of foam. Often made by pouring an espresso last into the milk .
